author: Anonymous Poet
title: Recipe Checklist
question: In the lecture the instructor works through the lecture using a pdf document called the recipe checklist, which I noticed is a much more concentrated version of the design recipes in edx. Is there any way for us students to download the same document?
student_answer:
https://s3.amazonaws.com/edx-course-spdx-kiczales/HTC/recipe-checklist.pdf
Under the "Design Recipes" page in the 3rd paragraph there's a link
